name: Trolley Folly
description:
Race around Trolley-Mart, gathering as many items as possible before the timer runs out. Make sure to drop off your items at the checkout as frequently as possible to gain points because the bigger your trolley gets, the harder it is to control and the greater the chance of losing items as you make sharp turns. Don't forget to dodge the other shoppers and weave a path as far away from the checkouts as possible to get to the shelves with the most loot!

Controls:

  • Use WASD in an attempt to control the trolley
  • Press ESC to pause/unpause
  • SPACE is a break for when your trolley gets completely out of control
  • R resets the level
  • The current number of items in your trolley is shown in the bottom left and the number on the bottom right is the amount of items you have scored by going back to the checkout and emptying your trolley.

Game Hints: 

  • To score points you need to checkout your basket by the main doors where you spawn in. 
  • The aisles furthest from the checkout desks have the highest density of items.

This game was made for both the GMTK game jam and the Game Dev London Summer Jam by Ruairidh Williamson and Sam Wilkinson. We hope you enjoy and we would love to get your feedback
